headline: SOUR PATCH KIDS® and J Balvin's Back to the Rayo Tour Partner to Launch an Exclusive Sour Egg Sweepstakes
summary: SOUR PATCH KIDS is partnering with Global Superstar J Balvin to launch the SOUR PATCH KIDS® Sour Eggs x J Balvin Back to the Rayo Tour Sweepstakes. Starting today, fans can enter to win one of twenty-five prize eggs that include a signed Rayo album CD, Back to the Rayo tour merch and SOUR PATCH KIDS Sour Eggs Soft & Chewy Easter Candy. The sweepstakes will run from April 3rd to April 20th, 2025, and a link to enter can be found here.* Winners will be notified on April 21st.

headline: CLIF BAR Launches New Caffeinated Collection, Helping Provide Sustained Energy with a Kick of Caffeine
summary: CLIF BAR today announced the launch of its Caffeinated Collection line of energy bars designed to help jump start activity with a kick of caffeine in each delicious bar. The new Caffeinated Collection features two flavors, Vanilla Almond and Caramel Chocolate Chip, developed in partnership with pro women's basketball MVP Breanna Stewart and tennis pro Frances Tiafoe.
